# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

- Mail-In Rebate ($4) - Earn $5 for each discarded 4
- Card Sharp ($6) - X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round
- Celestial Pack ($4) - Choose 1 of up to 3 Planet cards
- Jumbo Celestial Pack ($6) - Choose 1 of up to 5 Planet cards
- Magic Trick voucher ($10) - Playing cards can be purchased from the shop

**Analysis:**

My strategy is heavily focused on Three of a Kind hands. I have:
- Zany Joker (polychrome) - +12 Mult for Three of a Kind, x1.5
- The Trio - X3 Mult for Three of a Kind
- Abstract Joker - +18 Mult from 6 jokers
- Hanging Chad - Retriggers first card 2 additional times


- Sock and Buskin - Retriggers face cards

I have Venus ready to upgrade Three of a Kind from Level 2 to Level 3, gaining 20 chips and 2 Mult. Card Sharp could amplify my scoring since I frequently play Three of a Kind multiple times per round, giving me X3 Mult on repeated hands. The Celestial packs offer flexibility to level up other hands or add new scoring mechanics.

Mail-In Rebate doesn't fit my current setup, and Magic Trick is out of budget at $10. Since the next blind is the Ante 5 boss, I need to maximize my scoring potential now. I can spend up to $9: Venus is free and essential, Card Sharp costs $6 and synergizes well with my playstyle, leaving $3 for a Celestial Pack at $4 if I want additional planet cards for future scaling.

Card Sharp is particularly strong since I regularly cycle through Three of a Kind multiple times per round—the X3 Mult multiplier would compound significantly. However, I'm at my joker capacity and would need to sacrifice something. Comparing my current jokers, Zany Joker and Sock and Buskin are both critical to my hand strength, while Abstract Joker provides solid baseline multiplier scaling.

Given that all my jokers serve important functions, it makes more sense to focus on what I can do without sacrificing. I'll use Venus to strengthen Three of a Kind instead, then consider whether to save for a Celestial Pack or pursue other upgrades.
